item.title: SW设计真的是狗屎[0-50]
item.description:
SW设计真的是狗屎 两台PS4都出掉了,SW也没用了,现在不知道自己绑定过多少电脑,出掉之前有没有反激活.刚才试过了至少还能绑一台电脑,PSN ID 我全部清除了, 有需要自取
Thank you for purchasing Save Wizard For PS4 MAX!Your License Key is:
V4WF-BHGC-FTDY-82YD
How to activate Save Wizard For PS4 MAX
[*]Download the client
[*]Once downloaded, open swps4max.zip.
[*]Next, run swps4max.msi and follow the on screen instructions.
[*]Run Save Wizard For PS4 MAX via the desktop shortcut.
[*]Enter V4WF-BHGC-FTDY-82YD and click OK.
Activation should now take place and Save Wizard for PS4 MAX will now be ready for use.
目前在问客服是否能够申请重置,如果能重置,重置之后license改了就发到这个帖子里吧.看贴吧至少是4,5天之后了...
item.content:encoded:
有点追求:
SW设计真的是狗屎
两台PS4都出掉了,SW也没用了,现在不知道自己绑定过多少电脑,出掉之前有没有反激活.刚才试过了至少还能绑一台电脑,PSN ID 我全部清除了, 有需要自取
Thank you for purchasing Save Wizard For PS4 MAX!Your License Key is:
V4WF-BHGC-FTDY-82YD
How to activate Save Wizard For PS4 MAX
[*]Download the client
[*]Once downloaded, open swps4max.zip.
[*]Next, run swps4max.msi and follow the on screen instructions.
[*]Run Save Wizard For PS4 MAX via the desktop shortcut.
[*]Enter V4WF-BHGC-FTDY-82YD and click OK.
Activation should now take place and Save Wizard for PS4 MAX will now be ready for use.
目前在问客服是否能够申请重置,如果能重置,重置之后license改了就发到这个帖子里吧.看贴吧至少是4,5天之后了...

宛若青空:
感谢，最近正好在愁怎么把港服号的存档转移到日服号来，还想去某宝花点钱改签

fancykid:
没想到还能白嫖sw，感谢
